title: Get Microsoft Office for life — and all it costs is $30
content:
Macworld

If the price of purchasing the full Microsoft Office suite of productivity apps is much higher than your need for using its heritage programs like Word or Excel, then this deal could help level the equation.

Right now, you can lock in a lifetime license for Microsoft Office Professional Plus 2019 for Windows or Microsoft Office Home and Business 2019 for Mac — and rather than paying a monthly subscription fee, you can get either for just a $29.97 offer for both Mac and Windows users.

While a subscription to Microsoft Office 365 will set you back at least $70 in monthly fees per year, this one-time-only purchase gets you all those popular Office apps at less than half that cost — and your access is for life.

Windows users will receive Office Professional Plus 2019, which includes Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook, OneNote, Publisher, and Access. As for Mac users, they get Home & Business, which includes those same apps except for Publisher and Access, while adding Teams.

Whether you need to create budgeting spreadsheets, stellar presentations, or just need to bank out a solid report on a reliable word processor, Office has all the tools you’ll need.

For all your creative, educational, or professional projects, get Microsoft Office Home and Business 2019 for Mac or Microsoft Office Professional Plus 2019 for Windows at one of the lowest prices of the year, just $29.97, a savings of $200 off the regular price.
